title: Decentralized Secure Document Sharing Platform
description: A platform leveraging blockchain to securely share documents with fine-grained access control and immutability. Users can upload, share, and track documents with confidence knowing their data is protected and auditable.
features: Document Upload & Storage: Securely store documents on a decentralized network using IPFS or similar.
Access Control: Granular permission management using smart contracts on the blockchain.
Version Control: Immutably track document versions on the blockchain.
Audit Trail: Comprehensive audit trail of document access and modifications.
User Authentication: Secure user authentication leveraging cryptographic keys.
Search & Retrieval: Efficient document search and retrieval capabilities.
